targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "g1OldGen.max" WHERE "application" = 'timeseries-aggregator' AND "subsystem" = 'trends' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "value" FROM "g1SurvivorSpace.used" WHERE "application" = 'timeseries-aggregator' AND "subsystem" = 'trends' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

alert.message: This alert indicates drop in kafka records send rate.
alert.name: Timeseries Aggregator- drop in kafka records send rate

alert.message:
This is an alert for excessive lag in reading records from Kafka's "metricpoints" topic.
If the alert is only red on a few pods, it can often be cleared by deleting the pod(s) in the Kubernetes dashboard.
If you delete more than one pod, do so slowly to give the system time to stabilize before deleting the next pod.
Kubernetes will then launch a new pod that usually will not show the same large lag.
This is due to the possibility of timeseries-aggregator running on the same k8s host as a "greedy" (CPU-wise) service like secret-detector.
alert.name: Timeseries Aggregator- increase in kafka iterator age

alert.message: This is an alert from Timeseries Aggregator for increase in kafka producer's record send error rate.
alert.name: Timeseries Aggregator- increase in records send error rate

panels.title: External Kafka Records Produce- Failure rate
External Kafka Records Produce- Success rate

alert.message: This is an alert for increase in rate of invalid metric points.
alert.name: Timeseries Aggregator- increase in invalid MetricPoints

panels.description:
Would happen incase the metricpoint has an invalid value i.e negative. 
Its most likely a client integration issue
panels.title: Invalid MetricPoints OneMinuteRate
Trend Metric Compute Time in Ns (*_99)

alert.message: This is an alert for increase in disordered metric points.
alert.name: Timeseries Aggregator- increase in disordered MetricPoints

panels.description: This would happen if the metric points are not sorted by timestamp, can be expected during kafka outage
panels.title: Disordered Metric Points OneMinuteRate
Count Metric Compute Time in Ns (*_99)
Histogram Metric Compute Time in Ns (*_99)

alert.message: This is an alert for increase in MetricPoint compute failure.
alert.name: Timeseries Aggregator- increase in unique trends count

panels.description: Number of trends computed for each kaka partition
panels.title: Trends Count

alert.message: This alert indicates the increase in windowed metric deserialisation error rate.
alert.name: Timeseries Aggregator- increase in windowed metric deserialise failure

alert.message: This alert indicates increase in deserialisation error rate.
alert.name: Timeseries Aggregator- increase in MetricPoint deserialise failure rate
